author: Euric Liew
comment: Not bad watch face. The watch face could have been maximise to a slightly bigger face. It's a bit small & cramp in my G Watch R. The hour & minute hands show correct time in idle mode. Too bad no small face & lack of customisation...
title: E.Liew

author: Esbjörn T
comment: With much more customisation... This could be one of the best
title: Early days...
